import React, { Component } from 'react'; import "./index.css"; class About extends Component { render() { return (

| What is Winter Retreat 2018? 

Winter Retreat 2018 is quite simply the absolute best thing you can do to end 2018. Come and join brothers and sisters in Christ for an absolutely incredible time of fellowship, prayer, praise, intimacy and growth. There will be messages from the Word, praise music, intimate small groups, fun group games and activities, and of course amazing fine dining. It is also a great time to make friends as well, so if you completely don't know anyone who is going, you are sure to come back with exponentially more friends than when you first arrived.



"Winter Retreat is the greatest thing I have ever experienced" - every person who ever attended, 2017

| Theme : "Perseverance"

"I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith." - 2 Timothy 4:7

This is the awesome theme for Winter Retreat 2018. It is awesome because it is from the Bible and the Bible is really cool and awesome. This verse embodies perseverance in our walk with Jesus.

| When : Friday, December 28th to Monday, December 31st 2018

  • Check-in 3:00pm to 4:00pm on December 28th
  • Check-out 6:30pm on December 31st

| Where : Cohutta Springs Conference Center

Directions:

1175 Cohutta Springs Rd, Crandall, GA 30711

| Departure from Atlanta 

Buses will depart from ACCCN (5055 E Morton Rd, Alpharetta, GA 30022) and ACCCNW (1837 Bill Murdock Rd, Marietta, GA 30062) on December 28th sometime like around 12 or so? Something like that

| Packing List (What to Bring)

  • Bible
  • Notepad & Pen
  • Towel and Toiletries
  • Backpack / Small bag to carry things around
  • Sleeping bag & Pillow
  • Proper clothing for winter weather (4 days)
  • Closed-toed shoes
  • Sandals for showers
  • Snacks (ie: Shin Ramen, carrots & celery, discounted halloween candy, and that super spicy Korean ramen that comes in that black packaging)

| Do NOT bring

  • Video Games
  • Tobacco
  • Alcohol
  • Drugs (unless for medical purposes in which case you will indicate upon registering)
  • Weapons (ie: firearms, knives, excaliburs, Trident of Poseidon, The Elder Wand, a nuclear missile)
  • A swimsuit (even though there is a lake, it will be winter time)
  • Negativity
  • Stolen goods

 Back to top
) }; }; export default About;
